summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 633 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1583 m), light levels (up 3010 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.6°C), and outside temperature (up 4.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 633.4m lower than yesterday, 542.0m lower than the past week, 1583.5m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1090.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1632.9m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, very clammy and humid and near calm conditions. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and bright intervals likely. Weather could become unsettled.
